summary: A suite of Terraform data checks that parse AWS IAM policy documents and related resource policies, applying CloudSplaining and custom logic to identify overly permissive configurations, privilege escalation paths, credential exposure, data exfiltration risks, wildcard actions, public access, and incorrect OIDC trust settings for GitHub Actions, as well as detecting references to managed administrator policies.
business_intent: Enable security and compliance teams to automatically detect insecure IAM policies in infrastructure-as-code, enforce leastâ€‘privilege principles, and prevent potential breaches such as credential leaks, privilege escalation, and data loss in AWS environments.
